clues.text: Pillsbury Sound between St. Thomas & St. John in this U.S. territory was named for a U.S. admiral, not a baker
Milford Sound in this country's South Island was described by Rudyard Kipling as the 8th Wonder of the World
Darwin Sound lies on the south coast of this South American island, the "land of fire"
Almost all of Connecticut's coastline lies along this arm of the Atlantic
This 1,980-mile-long river flows across Alaska & enters the Bering Sea via Norton Sound

rounds.category: FOOD WORDS CREATED IN THE AMERICAS

clues.text: Avocado is from the Nahuatl, as is this dip made with avocado, tomato, onion & spices

5-letter word for meat in strips that has been preserved by drying

An attorney not following court rules, or what a broken vending machine is

Unacceptable, or no longer in the queue
